___gatewayTimestamp.description: Timestamp upon receipt at the gateway. If present, this property will be overwritten by the gateway; submitters are not intended to populate this property.

items.description: Ship symbolic name. i.e. one of: SideWinder, Adder, Anaconda, Asp, Asp_Scout CobraMkIII, CobraMkIV, Cutter, DiamondBack, DiamondBackXL, Eagle, Empire_Courier, Empire_Eagle, Empire_Trader, Federation_Corvette, Federation_Dropship, Federation_Dropship_MkII, Federation_Gunship, FerDeLance, Hauler, Independant_Trader, Orca, Python, Type6, Type7, Type9, Viper, Viper_MkIV, Vulture

___horizons.description: Whether the sending Cmdr has a Horizons pass.
